edited_stories.edited_story_text: A house decorated in holiday dressing. Bright lights illuminating a well furnished dining room. A Christmas tree stood in the living room, showered with ornaments that was an astonishing sight to see. The table was set, carefully, and meticulously. And in the center, a cake, beautifully decorated. So much so, that one of the men invited, was captivated by it when he arrived.
